headline: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks That Are Worth Buying the Dip
summary: The market was enchanted with artificial intelligence (AI) in 2023 and 2024.  AI stocks have started to tumble quickly, with AI-related companies like Palantir Technologies and Tesla trading down over 30% from all-time highs.  This price drop among AI-related stocks has presented some attractive buy-the-dip opportunities for investors focused on the long term.
